Write a short story about a group of mice who have different talents and work together to create a beautiful performance.
Create a series of illustrations that show the different stages of the mice's practice and rehearsals, leading up to their big performance.
Write a poem that explores the theme of jealousy and how it can be overcome through hard work and determination.
Create a short video that showcases the mice's journey from learning to sing to performing in front of an audience, with a focus on the importance of teamwork and perseverance.
Write a blog post that offers tips and advice for overcoming jealousy and focusing on your own growth and progress, using the story of the mice as an example.
